verses.roman:
saba dravyera kichu kichu upayoga kailā
svādu, sugandhi dekhi' bahu praśaṁsilā

synonyms: saba dravyera—of all the articles; kichu kichu—something; upayoga kailā—used; svādu—tasteful; su-gandhi—aromatic; dekhi'-seeing; bahu—very much; praśaṁsilā—He praised.
translation: He tasted a little of everything they contained and praised it all for its flavor and aroma.
